pgrid.core.maintenance.identity
Class CoUPolicy

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.maintenance.identity.CoUPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
JoinLeaveProtocol, MaintenancePolicy
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoFPolicy
public class CoUPolicy
extends Object
implements JoinLeaveProtocol, MaintenancePolicy

This class implement the Correct On Use (CoU, Eager) algorithm to do P-Grid maintenance.

Author:
Renault John
